article.headline: Mnuchin tested negative for coronavirus Friday morning, Treasury says
article.body: Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin tested negative for COVID-19 Friday morning, Treasury spokeswoman Monica Crowley said in a short statement on Twitter. The statement comes after news early Friday that President Donald Trump and first lady Melania Trump tested positive. U.S. stock futures YM00, +0.82% slid Friday morning as investors digested the reports. Crowley said Mnuchin has been tested daily and will continue to be.
